block.p: LEVITAN-Arthur on October 17, of Tallahassee, Florida, formerly of Mendham, NJ. Beloved husband of Miriam, devoted father and father-in-law of Mark and Gabrielle, Steven and Anna, and Don and Chelsie. Grandfather of Daniel, Jeremy and Keeha. Loving brother and uncle. Graveside service 1:30pm Thursday at Hebrew Congregation Cemetery, South Road, Mount Freedom, NJ. Memorial donations to Deborah Hospital, Browns Mills, NJ.
